description_thought: Extracted from the home page content as it provides a concise overview of Talis Capital's mission and investment focus.
description: Talis Capital is a venture capital firm that supports founders who envision the future differently, focusing on high conviction investments at Seed & Series A stages across Europe and the US. The firm is involved in various sectors, demonstrating a diverse portfolio and a commitment to building the future. Talis Capital Limited operates under the regulatory oversight of the Financial Conduct Authority in the UK, ensuring a structured and secure investment process.
